title: The Path of Thanatos [FINAL] 2011 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
About Game:
************
You are the son of the great General Cadmon, who served in the Third Great War of monsters and men. You have grown up comfortable in the desert town of Ra Heru, never knowing the hardships of war. However, all that is set to change. Your Father is blamed for the murder of the King and taken away to be executed, your village is attacked and destroyed by monsters, and there is a plot in motion that could very well begin the Fourth Great War. What begins as a simple quest to rescue your Father shall become a fight for the survival of the human race...

Game Features:
**************
*7+ hours of game play and 14 unique areas
* Life and death choices
* An epic tale that spans years
* Over 40 unique abilities & enemies
